column4: hi, i want to switch from slackware to kubuntu,(tired of complications and resolve dependencies on hand ;-?) but i want to use the kde 4... its the 8.10 good to use?? or better download the 8.04??
8.10 isn't released yet. if you wait till the 30th you might as well use 8.10 then
